Articles.Content: I finally built a rover and it cant move, the wheels seem to be spinning but its not moving. I dont know whats wrong, i have batteries and everything but i dont have a engine which i dont think i need.
What wheels are you using? Perhaps the rover is too heavy.
I'm using 4 TR-2L Ruggedized Vehicular Wheels and my crafts mass in 4.8T
Picture of the craft? Usually that's very helpful.
